00020 
00021 class Analysis
00022 {
00023   public:
00024     // a filter function to decide which raw CFG node to show (if return true) or hide (otherwise)  
00025     // This is required to support custom filters of virtual CFG
00026     // Custom filter is set inside the intra-procedural analysis.
00027     // Inter-procedural analysis will copy the filter from its intra-procedural analysis during the call to its constructor.
00028     bool (*filter) (CFGNode cfgn); 
00029     Analysis(bool (*f)(CFGNode) = defaultFilter):filter(f) {}
00030 };
00031 
00032 class InterProceduralAnalysis;
00033 
00034 class IntraProceduralAnalysis : virtual public Analysis
00035 {
00036         protected:
00037         InterProceduralAnalysis* interAnalysis;
00038         
00039         public:
00040         void setInterAnalysis(InterProceduralAnalysis* interAnalysis)
00041         { this->interAnalysis = interAnalysis; }
00042         
00043         // runs the intra-procedural analysis on the given function, returns true if 
00044         // the function's NodeState gets modified as a result and false otherwise
00045         // state - the function's NodeState
00046         virtual bool runAnalysis(const Function& func, NodeState* state)=0;
00047         
00048         virtual ~IntraProceduralAnalysis();
00049 };
00050 
00051 class InterProceduralAnalysis : virtual public Analysis
00052 {
00053         protected:
00054         IntraProceduralAnalysis* intraAnalysis;
00055         
00056         InterProceduralAnalysis(IntraProceduralAnalysis* intraAnalysis)
00057         {
00058                 this->intraAnalysis = intraAnalysis; 
00059                 // inform the intra-procedural analysis that this inter-procedural analysis will be running it
00060                 intraAnalysis->setInterAnalysis(this);
00061         }
00062         
00063         virtual void runAnalysis()=0;
00064         
00065         virtual ~InterProceduralAnalysis();
00066 };
00067 
00068 /********************************
00069  *** UnstructuredPassAnalyses ***
00070  ********************************/
00071 
00072 // A driver class which simply iterates through all CFG nodes of a specified function
00073 class UnstructuredPassIntraAnalysis : virtual public IntraProceduralAnalysis
00074 {
00075         public:
00076         // runs the intra-procedural analysis on the given function, returns true if 
00077         // the function's NodeState gets modified as a result and false otherwise
00078         // state - the function's NodeState
00079         bool runAnalysis(const Function& func, NodeState* state);
00080         
00081         virtual void visit(const Function& func, const DataflowNode& n, NodeState& state)=0;
00082 };
00083 // A driver class which simply iterates all function definitions one by one and call intra-procedural analysis on each of them.
00084 class UnstructuredPassInterAnalysis : virtual public InterProceduralAnalysis
00085 {
00086         public:
00087         UnstructuredPassInterAnalysis(IntraProceduralAnalysis& intraAnalysis) : InterProceduralAnalysis(&intraAnalysis)
00088         { }
00089                 
00090         void runAnalysis();
00091 };
